tasks.title: Fix missed Java call-edge extraction pattern
tasks.description: cross-language benchmark scenario: Fix missed Java call-edge extraction pattern.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Fix missed Java call-edge extraction pattern. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
